name: RLM Elementor Widgets Pack
author: Zach Silberstein

sections.description:
Welcome to RLM Elementor Widgets Pack!
This is a small pack of easy to use Elementor widgets.
Current widgets:
Copyright Widget – Copyright, in the format of CLIENT © YEAR by WEB DESIGNER
Food Menu Widget – Put all menu items into a widget, including headers
Food Menu Sections Widget – Quickly list all sections of a menu
Daily Specials Widget – Quickly list all daily specials
Responsive Header Widget – Quickly add a responsive header to each page of your site
Smart Button Widget – Smart button that hovers in the bottom corner of your site
